00037 #include "egs_isotropic_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_math.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_IsotropicSource::EGS_IsotropicSource(EGS_Input *input,
00042     EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f), shape(0), geom(0),
00043     regions(0), min_theta(0), max_theta(M_PI), min_phi(0), max_phi(2*M_PI),
00044     gc(IncludeAll) {
00045     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00046     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape");
00047     if( ishape ) {
00048         egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: trying to construct the shape\n");
00049         shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00050     }
00051     if( !shape ) {
00052         string sname; int err = input->getInput("shape name",sname);
00053         if( err )
00054             egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: missing/wrong inline shape "
00055               "definition and missing wrong 'shape name' input\n");
00056         else {
00057             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00058             if( !shape ) egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: a shape named %s"
00059                     " does not exist\n");
00060         }
00061     }
00062     string geom_name;
00063     int err = input->getInput("geometry",geom_name);
00064     if( !err ) {
00065         geom = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(geom_name);
00066         if( !geom ) egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: no geometry named %s\n",
00067                 geom_name.c_str());
00068         else {
00069             vector<string> reg_options;
00070             reg_options.push_back("IncludeAll");
00071             reg_options.push_back("ExcludeAll");
00072             reg_options.push_back("IncludeSelected");
00073             reg_options.push_back("ExcludeSelected");
00074             gc = (GeometryConfinement) input->getInput("region selection",reg_options,0);
00075             if( gc == IncludeSelected || gc == ExcludeSelected ) {
00076                 vector<int> regs;
00077                 err = input->getInput("selected regions",regs);
00078                 if( err || regs.size() < 1 ) {
00079                     egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: region selection %d used "
00080                        "but no 'selected regions' input found\n",gc);
00081                     gc = gc == IncludeSelected ? IncludeAll : ExcludeAll;
00082                     egsWarning(" using %d\n",gc);
00083                 }
00084                 nrs = regs.size(); regions = new int [nrs];
00085                 for(int j=0; j<nrs; j++) regions[j] = regs[j];
00086             }
00087         }
00088     }
00089     EGS_Float tmp_theta;
00090     err = input->getInput("min theta", tmp_theta);
00091     if(!err) min_theta = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00092 
00093     err = input->getInput("max theta", tmp_theta);
00094     if(!err) max_theta = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00095 
00096     err = input->getInput("min phi", tmp_theta);
00097     if(!err) min_phi = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00098 
00099     err = input->getInput("max phi", tmp_theta);
00100     if(!err) max_phi = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00101 
00102     buf_1 = cos(min_theta); buf_2 = cos(max_theta);
00103 
00104     setUp();
00105 }
00106 
00107 void EGS_IsotropicSource::setUp() {
00108     otype = "EGS_IsotropicSource";
00109     if( !isValid() ) description = "Invalid isotropic source";
00110     else {
00111         description = "Isotropic source from a shape of type ";
00112         description += shape->getObjectType();
00113         description += " with ";
00114         description += s->getType();
00115         if( q == -1 ) description += ", electrons";
00116         else if( q == 0 ) description += ", photons";
00117         else if( q == 1 ) description += ", positrons";
00118         else description += ", unknown particle type";
00119 
00120         if( geom ) geom->ref();
00121     }
00122 }

00126 EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00127         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00128     createSourceTemplate<EGS_IsotropicSource>(input,f,"isotropic source");
00129 }
